>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
[start](pages : 22â€“45)[end]
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="[start]"/>
      <group delimiter=" : " prefix="(" suffix=")">
        <label variable="page"/>
        <text variable="page"/>
      </group>
      <text value="[end]"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "page": "22-45", 
        "title": "His Anonymous Life", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
